scripts.start.be: cd backend && (venv\\Scripts\\activate || source venv/bin/activate) && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.build.be: cd backend && python -m ensurepip --upgrade && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && python -m pip install virtualenv && python -m virtualenv venv && (venv\Scripts\activate || source venv/bin/activate) && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build.fe: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
